website_summaries.verdict: Large mat size ensures no mess reaches the floors — just wipe clean after use.
pros: The dimensions of the mat measure 51 inches X 44 inches, which works for many activities, including eating, painting, or drawing
The material the mat is made of ensures an easy clean up after every use, with no need to waste time machine washing it
cons: The material is thin, and customers have mentioned a strong vinyl smell when removing it from the original packaging

customer_reviews.title: Not just for human babies
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my cat because he was stressed from us moving and kept peeing next to his box. We put it under his litter box and it's been a life saver. He has a big box, and this covers a good amount of space around it and will protect our floors nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr Converse

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean but low quality
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews, I knew this splat mat would be thin. I didn't expect it to tear 3 days into using it. Even though it's thin, I thought that the 4.5 star rating meant I would at least get a few months of use before any damage. I do recommend this because it's cheap and easy to spot clean, plus it isn't unusable with the tear, but spend the extra $10-$15 if you want a thicker, higher quality mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job - nothing hefty, but it does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: This splat mat definitely "does the trick" of protecting your floors from inevitable baby splatters. The plastic is somewhat thin and after a month or so of use, the wheel of our high chair has already put a little tear in the center of it; but it does the job while also having a decently cute print. If you are looking for something nice and thick, this is not it. But if you just want something cheap that you'll probably throw away after baby gets out of the "throwing puree everywhere" stage, then this will definitely work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Splat Mat
customer_reviews.text: This splat mat worked great. I used it for a messy relative at Thanksgiving who knows she's messy, and had no problem having it put under her chair at my table to protect my rug. I'm sure it would be great under high chairs as well. It was also very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Sally A. Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable splat for toddlers moms
customer_reviews.text: I like this splat. Raising toddler you have a lot of mess around his chair. This splat helps a lot. Easy to clean, soft and comfortable. Also fits to my grey kitchen. I even thinking to buy one more for my kitchen table.
customer_reviews.author: evadace

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of this but not 100% the product.
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and I will keep it but I do not see it lasting a long time. I was under the impression (my fault) that is was like cloth with a vinyl like covering. It is nice and I hope it proves me wrong because the color is cute. Super positive note it is way bigger than I was expecting and I LOVE that.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: A back saver
customer_reviews.text: This product makes feeding time clean up a breeze my granddaughter is at the age now where she’s learning to feed herself (a messy time)a few strokes with the cleaning wipe and viola it’s all clean again
customer_reviews.author: Tursonya W.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Material
customer_reviews.text: The worst mat. I ended up cutting it up & using it for cat pads. It wrinkled up, super thin, terrible material. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean-up
customer_reviews.text: This product is great to help save wood floors from soaking in all the food a baby drops over the sides of the high chair when learning to feed itself. It's an easy clean-up with a wet paper towel or sponge and preserves the flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I’m on the fence about this. It’s a glorified shower liner. It does the job just not the level of sturdiness that I thought I would be getting
customer_reviews.author: D P

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell. Cheap material.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not what I was expecting, so cheaply made for the price. It smells very strong of vinyl which children shouldn’t be breathing in to begin with it’s not healthy. I soaked it and let it sit outside for days and it still stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute design, good size
customer_reviews.text: Cute and subtle design which should blend in nicely with any interior. Good size - not too small, not too big. Very easy to wipe the mess.
customer_reviews.author: LamaMama

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what ive been needing, although im not if its machine washable, but it wipes very easy, and is water proof and has a wide range. Im happy with it and its made clean up easy.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Thin plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is just a piece of poor quality, thin plastic. I feel taken.
customer_reviews.author: Naika

customer_reviews.title: Great invention!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for babies throwing their food on the ground! A simple answer for the clean-up crew......
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The mat is super easy to be clean, just run under water, everything will go...
customer_reviews.author: iSiS

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to protect the section of my wool rug underneath the breakfast table where the grandbaby sits when eating. Sturdy, easy to clean. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Pieratt

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this splat mat. It easy to fold and clean up after every meal.
customer_reviews.author: valeriediazxo

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: This does not stay in place. It's always moving and bunching up. It is also slippery. I almost fell numerous times.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Renee Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Useful protection for floor. It smells when first opened - the smell went away after keeping it for a day in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Guru

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and not worth the money for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Used as floor mat under high chair, it does not stay on wood floor and it’s very thin, it’s the same as the waterproof table clothes that I get from dollar chair but much smaller. Not recommend and it’s not worth that much for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Plastic mat that slides all over and is hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Pooja K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I liked the mat, and it is not getting dirty very often. It could be cleaned very easily with or without water.
customer_reviews.author: Prashant Sharma

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is very good quality and we are happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I was expecting. I needed something that would stay put under the high chair. This is flimsy and folds up and doesn't stay in place on the floor. It's basically like a plastic tablecloth. Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and visiting Mom said she was going to get one too
customer_reviews.author: Theresa L. Yocom

customer_reviews.title: Not good for carpeted floors
customer_reviews.text: This mat is not heavy duty, which is more of what we needed. It gets easily bunches up beneath high chair wheels and is very awkward to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: Flimsier than i expected. Ended up cutting it to lay on my dining room chair to protect from baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent purchase! With a messy 3 year old and new white carpet in our dining room, the splat mat is a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: J. Addis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great splat mat and area we can do arts and crafts on without ruining the floors! Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it’s so easy to clean and I don’t need to worry about stains on my wood floor
customer_reviews.author: MonG

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: this mat is exactly what we needed to keep our dinning room rug clean. its easy to clean and looks good in our space.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: To thin don't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: Way to thin my grandbabys slip on it I can’t use it not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Angela  castillo

product_meta.title: Baby Splat Mat High Chair Floor Mat Plastic Grey with White Dots Waterproof Large Stylish (Size 51"x 44")
product_meta.description:
Amazing and new high chair splat mat is a real Mom's and Dad’s saver.

Generously sized and super easy to pack. Made from easy wipe, waterproof fabric to protect any type of surface from spills, stains and crumbs, while your baby is enjoying his meal. Messy mat keeps your environment tidy, no more mess and chaos in the room.

Let your baby enjoy any activities you like, without worries about the mess after. Grey floor protector will not distract the baby, so he can enjoy his meal quietly.

Especially designed to use under the high chair, also can be used for painting or other messy activities to avoid dirty carpet, floor or even the table.

Package Contains - 1 splat mat
feature_bullets: LARGE – our splash mat is generously sized 110x130 (51‘x44‘). It perfectly protects your floor and carpet around highchair when feeding your baby. This mat is bigger than of most other competitors‘
WATERPROOF – just wipe clean with paper or wet cloth, and wipe with cleaner when colored food leaves stains. No need to waste time for machine wash after every use, unlike with fabric splash mats
SAFETY – our big children splash mat is BPA-free, vinyl-free, phthalate-free and lead-free

MULTIPURPOSE – keep the floor clean with messy mat while little diners learn mealtime skills and mini artists put their imaginations to work. Ideal as a tablecloth when painting, crafting or for messy play activities. Perfect for picnics in nature as mat is not fabric and you easily wipe clean both upper and bottom side
STYLISH - our big and grey splat mat fits on any type of surface and does not ruin the design of the room

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars279 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
